channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 10:09 Threat of Artebroch! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 🔴 10:09 Threat of Artebroch! Now in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 10:05 Plowing of the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
